activities: Action Verb, LLC offers web hosting, content management, e-commerce, and file hosting services.  Customers are asked for information such as name, company name, email address, billing address, and credit card information.  Customers may further choose upload files or other digital content to our services.  This information is used to provide our services, perform technical support, research, contact, and billing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
